column5: First off I'd like to give a big thanks to Mike and Ben for a great event. Also like to thank their team,the guys at the ramps,guys on the water, people helping with weigh-in(great system to keep the fish healthy), the kids helping to release the fish,the guys on stage and everybody else SUPER GREAT JOB..We also met alot of old friends and a bunch of new ones( even a few from Ontario) Also like to thank my partner Gaetan,we set 3 goals. First...make day 2 Second...5 fish each day Third...Top 50 We suceeded in all three, so for us it was a complete success for two old muskie guys  YIPPEEEE... They also got a pic of me smiling..  but you have to go here to find it.  http://www.wfn.tv/berkleyb1/
bah..I was scrutineer and it was awesome..but WFN and Berkeley site won't allow you to save any pics for yourself on your own computer for memories...where can I find some pics i can keep?

Congratulations to Jacques & Stephane Chopin on becoming THE 1's  I was not there nor did I participate however from what I have heard Mike, Ben and their Team did an awesome job.  For me, the best part was being able to keep in the loop and know what's going on during weigh-in by getting set-up on Twitter (R621fisher), was like being there, getting texts every couple mins with the next teams weight - just awesome and I think the B1 Team really set the bar for other tournaments and leagues to follow!   Cheers G.
